oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mel Tillis Live at Colonie Hill - 1978-07-21 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is from the Colonie Hill live show. The tape features a live performance of Mel Tillis (musician). The Colonie Hill live show is presented by Mort Cooperman, Bill McGivney and the WHN radio network. The recording of Mel Tillis is from July 21, 1978. The tape is the second recording of two.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mel Tillis
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Unidentified tune (Mel Tillis) -- (01:44) Mel Tillis tells a story about a woman and Buck Owens -- (09:24) Ruby Don't Take Your Love to Town (Mel Tillis) -- (11:23) Tillis reflects on his time in the Air Force and his time after -- (15:15) Detroit City (Mel Tillis) -- (16:33) Tillis discusses his upcoming schedule -- (18:13) Detroit City (Mel Tillis) -- (18:55) Unidentified fiddle tune [featuring Larry Kenny outro voiceover] (Mel Tillis) -- (19:58) When I Stop Leaving (I'll be Gone) (Charley Pride) -- (22:25) Ready for the Times to Get Better (Crystal Gayle) -- (24:54) La Choy commercial tune ([Unidentified]) -- (25:23) Hearts Everyday Vitamins commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (25:54) The Thorn Birds commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (26:24) Kew Motor Inn commercial spot hosted by Lady L -- (27:24) WHN radio spot for the song of the year commercial spot hosted by an unidentified host -- (28:05) You Needed Me (Anne Murray) -- (31:38) Statues Without Hearts (Larry Gatlin) -- (34:21) Unidentified tune [featuring unidentified host voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (35:22) Dodge Omni commercial tune [featuring unidentified host voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (36:22) I Love New York Market radio commercial tune [featuring unidentified host voiceover] ([Unidentified]) -- (36:53) WHN commercial spot for the Listener Choice Awards hosted by an unidentified host -- (37:23) Do You Know You Are My Sunshine (Statler Brothers) -- (39:39) I Don't See Me in Your Eyes Anymore (Charlie Rich) -- (41:56) Jean Ladd performs a New York commercial spot
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Tillis, Mel;
